message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Hope you accept, as the money will be worth less in the next round.
You're being greedy, I'm being generous. Accept this and we can end it now.
I'm willing to compromise, but we're both losing money with each round. Let's split it 60/40 this time.
You're still being too greedy. I'm willing to give you more than the 40% you got in the last round, but you need to meet me in the middle.
